credit_line: Bequest of Rosalie Coe, from the collection inherited from her mother, Eva Johnston Coe
title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: counted stitches; cross, long-armed cross, and four-sided cross stitch on plain weave foundation
description: The lower portion of a sampler with bands of pattern, an alphabet, "Sarah Grundy, Anno Domini 1653" and a set of numerals.
name: Sampler
